transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan ji.

Customer: Hello Sapna account se baat kar rahe hain?

Executive: Sapna Enterprises.

Customer: Sir mere paas koi inquiries nahi aa rahi sir aap log bolenge by lead sir kaise use kare?

Executive: Sir kaun si company se baat kar rahe hain Sapna Enterprises?

Customer: Sir dhang se lead nahi aa rahi revenue service ke andar mein Karan service ke andar.

Executive: Sir Avneesh hai kya aapke account manager?

Customer: Mere paas last account manager ne bola tha kal message aaya tha mere paas ki unhone chhod diya hai kaam.

Executive: Yogendra Yogendra ne?

Customer: Unka naam nahi pata sir mujhe.

Executive: Sir main ek bar kal aapse connect karta hu actually aaj to off hai sir Sunday chutti hai aaj to koi bhi available nahi hai office mein abhi bhi hu.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Kal ek bar baat kar leta hu main aapse.

Customer: Theek hai sir.

Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving inquiries; wants to know how to use buyleads.

- Dissatisfied with lead quality in revenue service.



Resolution:

- Executive said he will connect next day.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect the next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, account manager
